name: ai-civic-monitoring-system
description: AI-Based Civic Issue Monitoring System - Complete Application Suite

scripts.install:all: cd Homepage && npm install && cd ../field-surveyor-app && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install && cd ../backend && npm install
scripts.dev: concurrently --names "HOMEPAGE,SURVEYOR,FRONTEND" -c "bgBlue,bgGreen,bgMagenta" "npm run dev:homepage" "npm run dev:surveyor" "npm run dev:frontend"
scripts.dev:all: concurrently --names "HOMEPAGE,SURVEYOR,FRONTEND,BACKEND" -c "bgBlue,bgGreen,bgMagenta,bgYellow" "npm run dev:homepage" "npm run dev:surveyor" "npm run dev:frontend" "npm run dev:backend"
scripts.build:all: cd Homepage && npm run build && cd ../field-surveyor-app && npm run build && cd ../frontend && npm run build
